scripts.build:windows: npm run build && rm -r build/wails/frontend/src/* && cp -r dist/* build/wails/frontend/src/ && cd build/wails && wails build && wails build -nsis
scripts.build:linux: npm run build && rm -r build/wails/frontend/src/* && cp -r dist/* build/wails/frontend/src/ && cd build/wails && wails build
scripts.build:android: npm run build && npx cap sync android && npx cap open android
